data.title: Don't think Shah Rukh Khan wanted to make it: Paul Schrader on SRK's shelved film with Martin Scorsese-Leonardo DiCaprio
data.meta_description: Schrader, best known for penning the screenplay of the classic 'Taxi Driver', spoke about how Shah Rukh Khan wanted to have control over things and how the project was pitched to Salman Khan as well
